categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic companies

nodes.text: Cascade Company was a company of clone troopers that fought against the Separatists during the Clone Wars.

Cascade Company fought on the surface of Kothlis against the Confederacy of Independent Systems to defend the Bothans that lived there. They were under the command of Jedi Generals Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi.
